property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Bullet.DecoratorSize
property.summary: Gets or sets the size of the area where the marker is located.
property.value: The size of the area where the marker is located. The default value is 16 px.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Bullet.GetDecoratorSize(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The size of the area where the marker is located.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Bullet.SetDecoratorSize(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The size of the area, where the marker is located.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Bullet.Size
property.summary: Gets or sets the size of the marker in "indeterminate" state.
property.value: The size of the marker when state is "indeterminate". The default value is 8px.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Bullet.GetSize(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The size of the marker when state is "indeterminate".
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Bullet.SetSize(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The size of the marker when state is "indeterminate".
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
